name: Dungeon Marauders - Epic Fantasy Card Game Quest & Dungeon Crawl Adventure
name_original: Dungeon Marauders - Epic Fantasy Card Game Quest & Dungeon Crawl Adventure
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure in Dungeon Marauders - a digital fantasy card game where you build a dungeon from the ground up and delve into the thrilling worlds created by others.

Challenge friends (or enemies!) as your crawl through the dungeons to capture monsters and loot. Get lost in a vivid fantasy world as you play the role of a hero who battles countless monsters and foes using spellcraft, wizardry and well-placed cards.

Capture monsters in the wilderness to customize your dungeon and build your deck by earning gear and experience to bolster your hero’s arsenal of weapons and skills.
